snippet.title: Silversoul Orphanage Trailer
snippet.description:
Silversoul Orphanage is a standalone realistic urban exploration simulation.
Out now on Itch https://azagamestudio.itch.io/silversoul-orphanage
⚫ A VHS Found Footage Urbex Sim horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design with subtle scares, focusing on the feeling of being stalked during an urban exploration.

Key Features ⚫ Explore the decrepit building as events unfold unlock multiple endings with real life VHS footage and utilize your camera mechanics including sepia cam mode, limited blitz mechanic and B/W cam mode to unveil the past and its secrets.

Story ⚫ Explore a abandoned soviet orphanage from the 1940s, learn the lore behind the building, orphans and atrocities that took place. But beware a unknown man within the premise stalks you at all times from the shadows.
